Text: Yeah, show those #&!@# terrorist towel-heads in their own language what will happen to them if they ever try another 9/11 caper....

sakstroy ... take it easy man and dont get tied up in knots ... 

Alos dont be such a god damn bigot ... a lot of us towelheads, using your totally unacceptable term of reference to all people in this part of the world, do not agree with the methods that were used by a very vocal minority... so please do not generalize ... and keep ur pants on ...

Well, I don't see those who say they don't agree with terrorism, ACTIVELY helping fighting it. For example, Bin Laden lived in Pakistan, SUPPOSEDLY allied to the US, near a military academy, so islamic 'rejection' of terrorists hides most of the time secret sympathy and ALMOST ALL celebrated 9/11 (openly or secretly), maybe western cultural penetration threatens male domination in those societies and OH, NO, spreads personal freedom which for muslims is unknown and forbidden (you can't leave islam under threat of death, THE ONLY BARBARIC RELIGION that acts that way).

Am really gald that u replied Sakstroy .... However, I really dont think tpb is the right forum for discussing the virtues and sins of Islam. I am a strong believer and supporter of personal freeedoms, including that which gives the individual his or her choice of religion without some other third person making absolute judgement or accusation of being barbaric or otherwise. I just believe we should all hold respect to one another as human beings.... so lets leave it at that for now and enjoy watching the film as a film and its historical depiction of events... some of which are most sad for us to remember. Just have a nice day and peace to u bro.

Any muslim should reject belonging to a religion that denies him or her the basic freedom of leaving it if so wished, that's the way they keep the myth of growing numbers, but through fear rather than persuasion and freedom, that's how dictatorial regimes fell in the past because people want freedom, so in time, goodbye backward islam...

sakstroy .... I have done my best trying to be civil with you ... but i clearly see that u are not deserving of such efforts .... 

It is people like you that thirve and flourish on hatred ... unfortuantely we too have our share of mentalities like yours ... All i can tell you and those like you is to crawl back into whatever holes you all crawled out of and shut the $%&^ up and grant us some peace of mind

You always talk of 'hatred' when someone mentions disgusting aspects of islam that disturb your 'peace of mind'. 

There is something very wrong with you people who 'submit' (that is 'islam') to such slavery being members of a religion that HATES personal human freedom, KILLING YOU if you want to leave it. 

THAT is why we must warn others so they don't believe your lies and get into a trap from which THERE IS NO ESCAPE.

A religion SO STUPID AND IGNORANT that the Quran, its unholy book, says that the sun every night sinks .... into a murky pond.... !!!!

These are UNDENIABLE FACTS mentioned in a total civil and friendly way.
